Package UserCode

Class SeaHorse

  • java.lang.Object
    • Framework.DisplayObject
      • UserCode.Fish
        • UserCode.SeaHorse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdatable
    public class SeaHorse
extends Fish
    The SeaHorse swims diagonally around the screen, randomly decelerating and sinking before starting upwards again
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nye Blythe

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class UserCode.Fish

        _collisionManager, _direction, _maxSpeed, _rand, _rotateBase, _rotateFlip, _size, _speed, _speedCurve, _startSpeed, _stateManager

      • Fields inherited from class Framework.DisplayObject

        model, rotateX, rotateY, rotateZ, scale, texture, transparent, x, y, z

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SeaHorse​(RandomRange rand, Vector2<Double> pos, Vector2<Double> aquariumSize)
      Constructor for objects of class SeaHorse

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void accelerate()
      METHOD: Increase the fish's speed gradually, this is called only if determined by the state manager
      Overrides Fish.accelerate(), extending it to apply to vertical movement as well as horizontal movement
      protected void decelerate()
      METHOD: Decrease the fish's speed gradually and cause the fish to sink over time, this is called only if determined by the state manager
      Overrides Fish.decelerate() to implement sinking behaviour
      protected void start()
      METHOD: Start the fish moving, beginning a swim cycle, this is called only if determined by the state manager
      Overrides Fish.start(), extending it to apply to vertical movement as well as horizontal movement
      protected void stop()
      METHOD: Stop the fish from moving, this is called only if determined by the state manager
      Overrides Fish.stop(), stopping only x movement instead of y movement, to facilitate sinking behaviour

      • Methods inherited from class UserCode.Fish

        checkEdges, setXDirection, setYDirection, swim, update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public SeaHorse​(RandomRange rand,
                Vector2<Double> pos,
                Vector2<Double> aquariumSize)
        Constructor for objects of class SeaHorse
        Parameters:
        rand - Reference to an instance of a random object
        pos - The initial position of the fish
        aquariumSize - The size of the aquarium the fish is being placed in
